item.title: 8/1: The Daily Report
item.description: Tom Hanson reports on the Trump administration's firing of the Bureau of Labor Statistics head, new escalations between the U.S. and Russia, plus more...

item.title: 8/1: CBS Evening News Plus
item.description: U.S. adds 73,000 jobs in July, falling short of forecasts; Reporter’s Notebook: Diane Arbus’ photography legacy

item.title: Sha'Carri Richardson arrested on domestic violence charge, police say
item.description: The incident occurred at a TSA checkpoint in Seattle, where Sha'Carri Richardson and a man got into an argument.

item.title: CBS Reports presents "Reverb | Gun Fight, Part Two"
item.description: In the second episode of this two-part documentary, CBS Reports follows a growing movement of militias refusing to comply with new gun regulations. As...

item.title: Jeannie Seely, country singer and Grand Ole Opry star, dies at 85
item.description: Jeannie Seely, the soulful country music singer known for hits like "Don't Touch Me," has died at 85.
